commercial.name: casumo.com
commercial.description: Online casino platform availbile in multiple jurisdictions. Compilant with very many complex regulations and still player friendly.
commercial.role: I've been working in many areas of the platform, from aquisition, then compliance to payments. Part of agile team. Most often focused on providing new functionalities or new services, also improving the platform as a whole.

commercial.name: Files Gateway
commercial.description: Small desktop application allowing to easily upload and download files from Integration Platform
commercial.role: Main developer of application, introducing the architecture and solutions, implementing requirements.

commercial.name: Business Integration Platform
commercial.description: Integration platform allowing customers to track and monitor orders, stocks movments by integrating their backend systems.
commercial.role: Implementing required functionality, testing, helping team members, leading scrum and retrospective meetings

commercial.name: jaxrs-client-proxy
commercial.description: Small library to read jax-rs annotated interfaces and create java proxies for them to then do REST calls using jax-rs client API
commercial.role: Initiator and main developer of the library. Managing tasks and requirements.

commercial.name: Precision AG Microservices
commercial.description: Set of microsvervices - mapping, authentication, permissions, ftp
commercial.role: Creating and managing microservices, implementing and testing required functionality, introducing and helping other team members.

commercial.name: Grain Movement Tracker
commercial.description: Grain movemnt and quality tracking application. Built with JBoss application as backend and PHP as frontend
commercial.role: Implementing and designing solutions for required functionality, managing polish team work, estimations and helping with analysis

commercial.name: Poultry Health
commercial.description: Struts based web application which allows to register poultry farms medical tests, provides the CRM and advanced reporting
commercial.role: Improving application quality, implementing required functionality, discussing the tasks and helping development team, introducing new members

commercial.name: Farmers Store
commercial.description: Web store which synchronise the data with customer backend warehouses system. It has built in CMS
commercial.role: Improving the performance of application, helping with requirement analysis, monitoring the tasks and introducing new members to project

commercial.name: Rest Services
commercial.description: Set of microservices (users, wallet, preference, etc.) used by media stores (music, video and game stores)
commercial.role: Performance testing, implementation of requirements, testing other team members tasks, being a member of agile team

commercial.name: Seeds Ordering
commercial.description: Application made for lead sugar beet seed manufacturer. It implements order placing and delivery management modules. Application communicates with customer SAP system.
commercial.role: Developing both ordering application and core framework used by company. Writing JavaScript components. Introduction of PHPUnit in PHP applications made by Adaptris

commercial.name: ODT
commercial.description: System made for leading telecommunication company. It helps to manage data and metadata. It provides utilities to import, transform and export data to many kind of reports.
commercial.role: Agile team member. Implementing planned tasks, taking part of scrum meetings, doing code reviews.

commercial.name: Blood Donors
commercial.description: System made for Polish healthcare department - helps to control blood giving and getting process
commercial.role: Responsible for medical tests section. In the further phase also gathering customer requirements, support customer and manage medical tests module. Improving the performance of whole application.

commercial.name: Maxofon
commercial.description: Master thesis. Program which allows to make VoIP connections. Project divided into two parts: Java standalone application and .Net Windows forms application. Project made for local company.
commercial.role: I built both applications and developed protocol to communicate over IP networks. It's using TCP/IP to establish and manage connections and UDP to send compressed sound data. I used open-source speex to compress the voice. In Java part I used Spring to manage user interface objects and actions.

hobby.description: Small research of how to use lambdas with new kotlin frameworks

hobby.name: Mobile OCR app
hobby.description: Another - after loteria.parago.pl OCR driven application
hobby.role: I have set up the application and it's business logic, I'm working on OCR and image object tracking algorithms - AR. I'm also responsible for writing advanced text parsing module

hobby.name: Photobox Downloader
hobby.description: Simple application which downloads all your pictures from photobox.co.uk
hobby.role: I've created this small app as there was no pictures export functionality on the page and downloading all pictures one by one was not acceptable

hobby.name: loteria.parago.pl
hobby.description: Small mobile application to ease the process of sending receipt data to https://loteriaparagonowa.gov.pl - national receipt lottery sponsored by government - scans the receipt, validates OCR read data and sends it to gov web page.
hobby.role: I was responsible for image analysis, finding the text in picture analysis, before OCR image preparation and performance upgrades. I was also teaching tesseract ocr the most common receipt fonts. Also web page set up.

hobby.name: Mercurial Plugin
hobby.description: Small mercurial plugin written in Python which parses the commit messages and writes relative data to local database.

hobby.name: parago.pl
hobby.description: Complex mobile and web application which simplifies home budget managament. Designed to make managing home budget as easy as possible. Created withing group of 4 friends.
hobby.role: I'm inventor of main idea of the application. I'm resposinble for web development - frontend and backend

hobby.name: Witek-MVC

hobby.name: Android Web Portal
hobby.role: Developing and implementing requested functionality, node.js research

hobby.name: Web Chat App
hobby.description: Scala and Play Framework research project which was implementing simple Chat application using web sockets
hobby.role: Creator, researcher and designer of application

hobby.name: eventbusjs
hobby.description: Very small open-source JavaScript library which implements Event Bus design pattern. Library is not described, to understand its functionality I recommend to see unit tests
hobby.role: I'm creator of the library. I was going to use it in new version of sledzeniepaczek.pl to simplify implementation of MVP pattern.

hobby.name: sledzeniepaczek.pl
hobby.description: A small web application that searches of packages in most popular companies. It uses HtmlUnit to scrap search results of each provider. It's hosted on Google Cloud – GAE. It also provides tracking system, which sends emails when pack state changes.
hobby.role: Co-inventor, co-founder and co-owner of this web application. I've made this application together with a friend. I developed security section (It's uses AspectJ aspects to read our annotations and protect procedure calls).

hobby.name: Car Expense Manager
hobby.description: Tapestry 5 research project which was going to help managing car expenses.
hobby.role: Creator and designer of application. I've put the main focus to research Tapestry 5 framework

hobby.name: USE
hobby.description: University project. System which allows to do dynamic tests and manage students tests, classrooms and students groups.
hobby.role: I was responsible for tests section. I implemented dynamic tests management, giving grades and checking tests by lecturers functionality.
